item.title: Lesson 1
item.description: LESSON 1 – DEPLOY A STATIC WEBSITE The source code for this lesson can be found on github here: https://github.com/mechtronium/Starlane/tree/main/tutorial/lesson-1/ START A STARLANE SERVER Open a terminal and start serving a Starlane instance: Starlane serve Open a browser window and point it to http://localhost:8080/index.html – you should see a STARLANE 404 page which is expected since we haven’t configured anything yet. CREATE THE LOCALHOST SPACE Next we are going to use the Starlane command line to issue a command to create the ‘localhost’ space.
